EmailTemplate.name: Business Select Feb Sweep.00 Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Grand & Toy Business Select!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Welcome to
Business Select! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBGZI1EN&utm_source=GTSystemGen&utm_medium=email&utm_content= Welcome+to+Grand+and+Toy+Business+Select&utm_campaign=10+29+2018+GZNURTURE1]]> You are now a member of our FREE program that delivers you and your small business the tools it needs to thrive. Save money: No cost. No catches. As a Business Select member, you'll be the first to receive perks such as: - Unbelievable discounts - 5% cash back in rewards** - Exclusive offers ONLY available to members Here is your first exclusive MEMBERS-ONLY offer: <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source=GTSystemGen&utm_medium=email&utm_content= Welcome+to+Grand+and+Toy+Business+Select&utm_campaign=10+29+2018+GZNURTURE1]]> $25 OFF
YOUR FIRST PURCHASE OF $100 OR MORE** Use Code SAVE25 Your membership includes: Unbelievable discounts
UP TO 20% OFF office products, including furniture and cleaning & breakroom supplies
UP TO 46% OFF paper
UP TO 25% OFF ink & toner
Special discounts on the latest technology
FREE Shipping* Save Now! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBGZI1EN&utm_source=GTSystemGen&utm_medium=email&utm_content= Welcome+to+Grand+and+Toy+Business+Select&utm_campaign=10+29+2018+GZNURTURE1]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Must sign in to your account in order to use the promo code. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. Minimum purchase is required after other discounts and before tax. Enter promo code SAVE25 at checkout. Limit one redemption per account. One time use only. Discount not valid on furniture or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/corp/SubscriptionCenterUnsubscribe.aspx?cmp=EBUNSUB2018&email=%%email%%]]>
